name: SantaBanter
0:
”Alexa open Santa Banter”
”Alexa launch Santa Banter”
”Repeat rhyme”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: santa banter
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Santa Banter is the festive rhyming game with the strange-sounding name. There are 10 ridiculous rhymes to solve for free, and you get as many guesses as you like.

So if the riddle was: Father Christmas is enjoying a film about a nasty shark that’s causing a lot of grief in Long Island, USA... the rhyme would be... Santa Claus is watching Jaws. (He loves Jaws.)

It’s a lot of fun and totally silly. Enjoy.

Here are some things you can say!
--------------------------------------
"Alexa, open Santa Banter"
"Repeat rhyme"
--------------------------------------

⭐ Santa Banter Question Stocking ⭐
Owners of the Santa Banter Question Stocking get access to 50 box-fresh rhymes to find. Serving suggestion: play whilst cooking the Christmas dinner and having a few sherries with your friends and family.

To get started, simply say: "Alexa, open Santa Banter"
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
